feed.title: Empower Campaign's PEAR channel Latest Releases

entry.title: Deneb 0.7.0 (alpha)
entry.content: Deneb provides a consistent CRUD interface to using Zend_Db base models and model collections, as well as segregated read and write DB pools and selectors

entry.title: Deneb 0.6.2 (alpha)
entry.content: Deneb provides a consistent CRUD interface to using Zend_Db base models and model collections, as well as segregated read and write DB pools and selectors

entry.title: Deneb 0.5.0 (alpha)

entry.title: EC_XHProf 0.1.0 (alpha)
entry.content: EC_XHProf is a simple class for managing XHProf runs and storing them according to virtual host ServerNames. You can also clear out runs. See the examples directory for examples.

entry.title: Noginn_RateLimit 0.1.0 (alpha)
entry.content: This is the empower fork of the project

entry.title: PHP_CodeSniffer_Standards_EC 0.3.0 (alpha)
entry.content: The PHP_CodeSniffer implementation of the EC coding standard

entry.title: ZendX 0.2.0 (alpha)
entry.content: This is a set of libraries outside of ZendFramework, in the ZendX namespace. Includes ZendX_JQuery

entry.title: Zend_Cache_Backend_Mock 0.1.0 (alpha)
entry.content: All items are stored in the backend instance (memory). Allows for proper mocking.
